instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISS ARMY / ARMASUISSE. Summary: Rfi Training Platform Shooting Infantry Weapons Armasuisse Competence Area Resources and Support Cc Wto. Description: Request for Information (RFI) in favor of a procurement market analysis of a training platform for shooting training with infantry weapons: In various projects from the Swiss army and Armasuisse, the training concept requires that an indoor trainer should be used for shooting training. As part of the “Method attempt for more efficient, more efficient and emission -reduced weapons training”, it should also be checked whether a simulation solution for the training of assault rifle and pistol brings advantages. A universal simulation platform is evaluated, on which other future systems can also be integrated. A uniform simulation platform would also enable a common (team) training with different weapons and simplify the application by the instructors. In addition, this could reduce the operating costs and allow cost -effective integration of future system if the simulation platform is selected.. Published Date: 2024-04-02. Closing Date: 2024-04-16. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: SWISS ARMY / ARMASUISSE
output.Summary: Rfi Training Platform Shooting Infantry Weapons Armasuisse Competence Area Resources and Support Cc Wto
output.Description: Request for Information (RFI) in favor of a procurement market analysis of a training platform for shooting training with infantry weapons: In various projects from the Swiss army and Armasuisse, the training concept requires that an indoor trainer should be used for shooting training. As part of the “Method attempt for more efficient, more efficient and emission -reduced weapons training”, it should also be checked whether a simulation solution for the training of assault rifle and pistol brings advantages. A universal simulation platform is evaluated, on which other future systems can also be integrated. A uniform simulation platform would also enable a common (team) training with different weapons and simplify the application by the instructors. In addition, this could reduce the operating costs and allow cost -effective integration of future system if the simulation platform is selected.

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: PROGRAMME BIM@CFF. Summary: Bim@cff Roadshow Programme Bim@cff. Description: The introduction of the BIM method concerns the entire Swiss construction sector. SBB will introduce BIM into infrastructure projects from 2025 as an essential element of the digital transformation of infrastructure facilities. We thus make, with you, an important contribution to effective planning, construction and exploitation oriented to the future of works and technical installations. In the frame of BIM@CFF Roadshow, we invite you To take a practical look at the implementation of Bim CFF Infrastructure. Participants in the project will present their experiences to you in BIM CFF projects and will share their knowledge. The presentations will be followed by a simple aperitif that will give way to technical discussions. It is also possible to participate in guided tours through or around the locations of the demonstration. The hep of Zurich and the University of Lucerne intend to acquire a Soft-Of-The-Art (PSW) examination (PSW) Software for education and studies, which will be made available to all members of the University and which will also be used for admission exams for studies and candidates. We are looking for a solution of the future offering great comfort of use for teachers, participants in exams, coordinators and administrators of exams, a wide range of functions for different test formats, maximum security against breakdowns and effective mechanisms against exam fraud. We are looking for a solution of the future offering great comfort of use for teachers, participants in exams, coordinators and administrators of exams, a wide range of functions for different test formats, maximum security against breakdowns and effective mechanisms against exam fraud. The acquisition includes annual license fees for a cloud -based SaaS solution as well as any unique implementation costs and maintenance and assistance costs. For the extent of the order, see the specifications.

Description: Temporary Employment Programs (Pvb) 2021 Logistics Labor Market Measures <br>  Publish Date: 03/01/2021 <br>  CPV: 80400000 <br>  Type: TendersServiceOpen procedure <br>  Dead Line: 05/04/2021 11:59 PM <br>  . Procurement object <br>  2.1 Project title of the procurement: (21040) 305 Maintenance SIARD Suite <br>  2.2 File number / project number: (21040) 305 <br>  2.3 Community vocabulary: <br>  2.4 Subject matter and scope of the contract: The Federal Archives developed the Software Independent Archiving of Relational Databases (SIARD) solution. This allows databases to be digitally archived independently of their software. The SIARD Suite application enables the extraction of data from databases such as Oracle, SQL Server, MS Access, etc. and their storage in the open and SIARD format. The application is programmed in JAVA and can run under various operating systems. The SIARD Suite is multilingual, currently in D / F / I / E and in use worldwide. The application is published as open source software (CDDL license) on GitHub (https://github.com/sfa-siard). A new partner is being sought for maintenance, support and further development of the SIARD Suite.. Published Date: 2021-03-01. Closing Date: 2021-05-04. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
